description: Main entry point of a Flutter application for a Tic Tac Toe game, defining the root widget, theme, UI structure, and interactions.

classes.name: TicTacToeApp
classes.description: Root widget setting up the theme and hosting the game interface.

classes.name: _TicTacToeAppState
classes.description: State class managing game state, UI updates, and user interactions.

classes.name: _StatusBar
classes.description: Widget displaying game status messages with icons and styling.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the app's UI.

methods.name: _buildTheme
methods.description: Defines the Material Design theme based on style guide colors.
